mapper.insert: insert into user_info(id, passwd, name, nickNm, ph_num) values (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{nickNm}, #{ph_num})
mapper.select: select * from user_info where name LIKE % || #{search} || % or nickNm LIKE % || #{search} || % or id LIKE % || #{search} || % or ph_num LIKE % || #{search} || %
